pulls.title: Added A.1 extension and A.3 UC
pulls.author: galledohm
pulls.body:
# What's Changed
Added two new use cases to expand PETRA's applicability in modern network environments:

- Energy-Aware Service Routing: Extended SD-WAN section to show how PETRA enables network controllers (SD-WAN, 5G slice orchestrators, etc.) to optimize path selection based on energy consumption alongside traditional performance metrics.

- SLA Negotiation for Energy-Efficient Services: New section demonstrating how operators can use PETRA metrics to offer environmentally-focused SLAs, allowing customers to select services based on renewable energy usage and sustainability targets.

## Impact
Broadens PETRA from basic energy monitoring to advanced routing decisions and business-level sustainability commitments
Addresses growing enterprise demand for verifiable environmental compliance
Positions PETRA as a comprehensive energy-aware networking solution
